Questionnaire

Project Questionnaire

Hi! I'm glad you're considering to hire me. I am absolutely passionate about my job. I dedicate all my best efforts, time and expertise into every project, whether it's for a small, one-person business or a big corporation. This means I need to be excited about it, which leads me to be quite selective.

Before you spend time and energy filling this application form, please let me quickly walk you through my approach and see if we're meant to be. If your project isn't thoughtfully prepared, we won't be a good match.

If you already have a vision of what you want and just need someone to execute it, we won't be a good match.

If your main concern is to reduce costs to a minimum, I can perfectly understand, but we won't be a good match. If you have a strong, interesting project that you've put a lot of thoughts into, if you know who you want to reach and know what you want to do for them, if you like my work and are ready to trust someone with expertise, we'll probably have an awe- some work experience together.

Please go see My Process to understand how things roll.

About

Eric Tirado is a Web Developer, Hand Letterer, Designer, Online Teacher and a Christ follower. He just got married to a wonderful woman, and is in the process of rebuilding his online precense. Go to the contact page if you're looking to hire him.
